title: Coral Beach Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, International, Thai, Buffet, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Salad-bar
description: Please confirm 100% Vegetarian for HappyCow.  Open air area, balcony, green area, best cozy, best location in Bagdad.  Water fall, open barbecue. Special parties held on occasions. Can be arranged and reserved for a special gathering. Very well English spoken staff, restaurant design very close to Italian Spanish or European style, very unique decoration, most of embassies members are our clients, unbeatable prices and services, buffet during the week days.
